code: import React from"react";import{useSelector}from"react-redux";import HeadCell from"./HeadCell/index";var headerCell=function headerCell(key,value){return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(HeadCell,{key:key,value:value});};var createHeads=function createHeads(columnsCount){var heads=[headerCell("№","№")];for(var i=0;i<columnsCount;i++){heads.push(headerCell(i+1,i+1));}heads.push(headerCell("Sum","Sum"));return heads;};var TableHead=function TableHead(){var columnsCount=useSelector(function(state){return state.matrix.settings.columnsCount;});var heads=createHeads(columnsCount);return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("thead",null,/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("tr",null,heads));};export default TableHead;
